question:
You have just started a course in a college which has no sports facilities of its own.
Write a letter to the manager of the nearest private sports club. In you letter
- introduce yourself
- say why you are interested in this sports club
- ask some questions about the club eg. facilities, members, costs.
text: I hope this letter finds you in good health. I am writing this letter in order to inquiry about the sports club at your wonderful private club.

My name is Honey Linn, a junior student from Pharmacy University, and I am aiming to be a professional gym trainer in the near future which is my dream. Generally, Pharmacy is a specialized course on medicine and medical-related institution while the school is not offering any physical activities and is significantly different from my hobby. When I have seen the amazing club advertisement on the main road billboard, it was amazing and perfectly matched what I need right now. I would like to join not only the weekly sports activities but also the daily Zumba club as well as a cardio workout class.

In addition to this, if you don't mind, you would please let me know the membership fees which are monthly or yearly whether I can get a discount with my student card or not, and what kind of facilities I can join after being a regular membership as well.
Looking forward to hearing from you with the great news.
